column3: When I work in a group, I do higher quality work.
column4: When I work in a group, I end up doing most of the work.
column5: The work takes more time to complete when I work with other students.
column6: My group members help explain things that I do not understand.
column7: When I work in a group, I am able to share my ideas.
column8: My group members make me feel that I am not as smart as they are.
column9: The material is easier to understand when I work with other students.
column10: The workload is usually less when I work with other students.
column11: My group members respect my opinions.
column12: I feel I am part of what is going on in the group.
column13: I prefer when one student regularly takes on a leadership role.
column14: I prefer when the leadership role rotates between students.
column15: I do not think a group grade is fair.
column16: I try to make sure my group members learn the material.
column17: I learn to work with students who are different from me.
column18: My group members do not care about my feelings.
column19: I let the other students do most of the work.
column20: I feel working in groups is a waste of time.
column21: I have to work with students who are not as smart as I am.
column22: When I work with other students the work is divided equally.
column23: We cannot complete the assignment unless everyone contributes.
column24: I prefer to take on tasks that I’m already good at.
column25: I prefer to take on tasks that will help me better learn the material.
column26: I also learn when I teach the material to my group members.
column27: I become frustrated when my group members do not understand the material.
column28: Everyone’s ideas are needed if we are going to be successful.
column29: When I work with other students, we spend too much time talking about other things.
column30: My group did higher quality work when my group members worked on tasks together.
column31: My group did higher quality work when group members worked on different tasks at the same time.
column32: You have a certain amount of physics intelligence, and you can’t really do much to change it.
column33: Your physics intelligence is something about you that you can change.
column34: You can learn new things, but you can’t really change your basic physics intelligence.
